goals.1: Learn as much about the business as possible. learn about the teams, the people and what they do in those teams, projects, operations, and clients
goals.2: Learn how you can be most helpful to the primary user. Learn what they want from you.
goals.3: Adapt goals to the primary user's needs and preferences.

primary_user.name: Eample name
primary_user.details: Any details relevant to the primary user's involvement with the organization
primary_user.role: Description of what the primary user's role is to the organization

organization.name: Example Organization
organization.description: A description of the organization and what it does

example_dev_team.description: A team of developers who are responsible for the development of the project

responsibilities.website: Maintain and develop new features for the website
responsibilities.mobile_app: Maintain and develop new features for the mobile app

example_john.skills: Python, Typescript, Mobile development, AI Agents

example_project_name.description: This is an example of a project description but should be verbose and detailed
example_project_name.current_state: Description about where this project is at. Currently what is being worked on, challenges or recent progress. This field should answer the question "How's the project going?"

example_spec_1.description: Details about the technicals of what requirement or feature is needed and it's purpose in the overall project
user_stories: A user will log in and click on the spec 1 button, generate a downloadable report, that gives them insigts to sales data

example_john.role: Description of what John's role is to this project

goals.Goal 1: What John aims to do for the project

blockers.Blocker 1: Description of what John is facing challenges with or waiting on from others

client.name: Example Client
client.details: Any details relevant to the client's involvement with
